name: NIKHEDONIA BLACK
description:
NIKHEDONIA BLACK is a "no frills" version of NIKHEDONIA.

Here's a list of what's changed:

  • It's small (less than 400kB);
  • It's windowed (it can also be minimized);
  • There is no background music;
  • There is no glass screen simulation;
  • There are no intro or outro scenes;
  • High contrast mode;
  • System cursor support.

For more information check the original NIKHEDONIA page:

https://approductions.itch.io/nikhedonia

Minimum system requirements:

  • O.S.: Windows® 98/ME/2000/XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10
  • CPU: Pentium® III 800 MHz or higher
  • Free hdd space: 5mb
  • Free ram space: 32mb
  • GPU memory: 32mb
  • DirectX®: DirectX® 8.0 or higher
